titleStmt.title: A pleasant conference upon the Observator and Heraclitus together with a brief relation of the present posture of the French affairs.
titleStmt.author: Phillips, John, 1631-1706.

notesStmt.note: A satire on the Tories and their periodicals.
Attributed to John Phillips. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
